description: After Annie and Oakley had identified Latias, Annie`s Espeon was sent out to try to stop Latias, who was disguised as Bianca (Alto Mare), from getting away. After Ash apparently insulted Annie for not addressing her properly, Annie`s Espeon used on Ash as payback. Annie`s Espeon lost sight of Latias after Ash helped her escape by running through the city. It later attacked Lorenzo while he was in his workshop working on a gondola.
name: Eifie (Zanner)
